title: Font Recognition
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130807084010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bergs_5284.jpg)

I need to find the name of this font, any help?
author: alvizm

comments.content:
Sure. Here is what it says under the General Disussion Forum:

> All topics are welcome—except font ID requests.

An here is what it says under the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20130807084010/http:/typophile.com/typeid):

> Need to know what font it is? Post it here.

Does that help?
